review: This device was reccomeded by a Best Buy assoc. Had to contact Amazon support for help registering the device since it did not like ANY Amazon account. What a hassle.! Once the device was registered and working it kept losing its network connection, changed router channels and various settings with no avail. Returned item. Bought a Sony BDP-S3500 and it works flawlessly compared to the Fire TV Stick. I do not reccomend the device.
author: Ray Long
